translations: n．无知者，愚昧者：对某一领域知识缺乏了解或无知的人。
· The conference was full of ignoramuses who didn't know anything about the topic.
会议上充满了对这个话题一无所知的无知者。

sentences.sentence: It keeps the ignoramuses like you out of medical school, "replied the professor."
sentences.translation: “它能让像你这种不学无术的人远离医学院。”教授回答道。
